64 void _projectPointsTriangle( int nPoints, array3D const *points, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D *proj, double *lambda )
65 {
66 
67  assert( validTriangle(Q0,Q1,Q2) );
68 
69  array3D s0 = Q1-Q0;
70  array3D s1 = Q2-Q0;
71 
72  std::array<double, 4> A = {{ dotProduct(s0,s0), 0, dotProduct(s0,s1), dotProduct(s1,s1) }};
73 
74  const int MAX_STACK_POINTS = 8;
75  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(B, double, 2 * nPoints, 2 * MAX_STACK_POINTS);
76 
77  for( int i=0; i<nPoints; ++i){
78  array3D rP = *points -Q0;
79  B[2*i] = dotProduct(s0,rP);
80  B[2*i+1] = dotProduct(s1,rP);
81  ++points;
82  }
83 
84  int info = LAPACKE_dposv( LAPACK_COL_MAJOR, 'U', 2, nPoints, A.data(), 2, B, 2 );
85  assert( info == 0 );
86  BITPIT_UNUSED( info );
87 
88  for( int i=0; i<nPoints; ++i){
89 
90  double *b = &B[2*i];
91 
92  lambda[0] = 1. -b[0] -b[1];
93  lambda[1] = b[0];
94  lambda[2] = b[1];
95 
96  *proj = restrictPointTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda);
97  lambda +=3;
98  proj += 1;
99  }
100 }
101 
115 void _projectPointsPlane( int nPoints, array3D const *points, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D *proj, double *lambda )
116 {
117 
118  assert( validTriangle(Q0,Q1,Q2) );
119 
120  array3D s0 = Q1-Q0;
121  array3D s1 = Q2-Q0;
122 
123  std::array<double, 4> A = {{ dotProduct(s0,s0), 0, dotProduct(s0,s1), dotProduct(s1,s1) }};
124 
125  const int MAX_STACK_POINTS = 8;
126  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(B, double, 2 * nPoints, 2 * MAX_STACK_POINTS);
127 
128  for( int i=0; i<nPoints; ++i){
129  array3D rP = *points -Q0;
130  B[2*i] = dotProduct(s0,rP);
131  B[2*i+1] = dotProduct(s1,rP);
132  ++points;
133  }
134 
135  int info = LAPACKE_dposv( LAPACK_COL_MAJOR, 'U', 2, nPoints, A.data(), 2, B, 2 );
136  assert( info == 0 );
137  BITPIT_UNUSED( info );
138 
139  for( int i=0; i<nPoints; ++i){
140 
141  double *b = &B[2*i];
142 
143  lambda[0] = 1. -b[0] -b[1];
144  lambda[1] = b[0];
145  lambda[2] = b[1];
146 
147  *proj = reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda);
148  lambda +=3;
149  proj += 1;
150  }
151 }

170 bool _intersectBoxTriangle(array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, array3D const &V0, array3D const &V1, array3D const &V2, bool interiorTriangleVertices, bool triangleEdgeBoxHullIntersections, bool triangleBoxEdgeIntersections, std::vector<array3D> *intrPtr, std::vector<int> *flagPtr, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
171 {
172 
173  bool intersect(false);
174  bool addFlag( flagPtr!=nullptr);
175  bool computeIntersection(interiorTriangleVertices||triangleBoxEdgeIntersections||triangleEdgeBoxHullIntersections);
176 
177  assert( ! (computeIntersection && (intrPtr==nullptr) ) );
178 
179  if(computeIntersection){
180  intrPtr->clear();
181  }
182 
183  if(addFlag){
184  flagPtr->clear();
185  }
186 
187  //check if Triangle Boundig Box and Box overlap -> necessary condition
188  array3D B0, B1;
189  computeAABBTriangle( V0, V1, V2, B0, B1);
190 
191  if( !intersectBoxBox( A0, A1, B0, B1, dim, distanceTolerance) ) {
192  return false;
193  }
194 
195  //check if triangle vertices are within the box
196  for( int i=0; i<3; ++i){
197  vertexOfTriangle(i, V0, V1, V2, B0);
198  if( intersectPointBox(B0, A0, A1, dim, distanceTolerance) ){
199  intersect = true;
200  if(!interiorTriangleVertices) break;
201 
202  intrPtr->push_back(B0);
203  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(0);
204  }
205  }
206 
207  //check if triangle edges and box faces intersect
208  if( !intersect || triangleEdgeBoxHullIntersections) {
209 
210  for( int edge=0; edge<3; ++edge){
211 
212  edgeOfTriangle(edge, V0, V1, V2, B0, B1);
213 
214  if(dim==2){
215  array3D p;
216  array3D faceVertex0, faceVertex1;
217 
218  for( int face=0; face<4; ++face){
219  edgeOfBox( face, A0, A1, faceVertex0, faceVertex1);
220 
221  if( intersectSegmentSegment(B0, B1, faceVertex0, faceVertex1, p, distanceTolerance) ){
222  intersect=true;
223  if(!triangleEdgeBoxHullIntersections) break;
224 
225  intrPtr->push_back(p);
226  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(1);
227  }
228 
229  }
230 
231  } else if(dim==3){
232  array3D p;
233  std::array<array3D, 4> V;
234 
235  for( int face=0; face<6; ++face){
236  faceOfBox( face, A0, A1, V[0], V[1], V[2], V[3] );
237 
238  if( intersectSegmentPolygon( B0, B1, V.size(), V.data(), p, distanceTolerance ) ) {
239  intersect=true;
240  if(!triangleEdgeBoxHullIntersections) break;
241 
242  intrPtr->push_back(p);
243  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(1);
244  }
245  }
246  }
247  }
248  }
249 
250  //check if triangle and box edges (dim=3) or box vertices (dim=2) intersect
251  if( !intersect || triangleBoxEdgeIntersections ) {
252 
253  array3D p;
254 
255  if(dim==2){
256  for( int i=0; i<4; ++i){
257  vertexOfBox( i, A0, A1, B0);
258  if( intersectPointTriangle(B0,V0,V1,V2,distanceTolerance)) {
259  intersect = true;
260  if(!triangleBoxEdgeIntersections) break;
261 
262  intrPtr->push_back(B0);
263  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(2);
264  }
265  }
266 
267  } else if(dim==3){
268  for( int i=0; i<12; ++i){
269  edgeOfBox( i, A0, A1, B0, B1);
270  if( intersectSegmentTriangle(B0,B1,V0,V1,V2,p,distanceTolerance)) {
271  intersect = true;
272  if(!triangleBoxEdgeIntersections) break;
273 
274  intrPtr->push_back(p);
275  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(2);
276  }
277  }
278  }
279  }
280 
281  return intersect;
282 }
283 
299 bool _intersectSegmentBox(array3D const &V0, array3D const &V1, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, bool interiorSegmentVertice, bool segmentBoxHullIntersection, std::vector<array3D> *intrPtr, std::vector<int> *flagPtr, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
300 {
301 
302  bool intersect(false);
303 
304  bool addFlag(flagPtr!=nullptr);
305  bool computeIntersection(interiorSegmentVertice||segmentBoxHullIntersection);
306 
307  assert( ! (computeIntersection && (intrPtr==nullptr) ) );
308 
309  if(computeIntersection){
310  intrPtr->clear();
311  }
312 
313  if(addFlag){
314  flagPtr->clear();
315  }
316 
317  array3D p, B0, B1;
318 
319  //check if segment boundig box and Box overlap
320  computeAABBSegment( V0, V1, B0, B1);
321  if( !intersectBoxBox( A0, A1, B0, B1, dim, distanceTolerance) ) {
322  return false;
323  }
324 
325  //check segment points
326  for( int i=0; i<2; ++i){
327  vertexOfSegment(i, V0, V1, B0);
328 
329  if( intersectPointBox(B0,A0,A1,dim,distanceTolerance) ){
330  intersect = true;
331  if(!interiorSegmentVertice) break;
332 
333  intrPtr->push_back(B0);
334  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(0);
335  }
336  }
337 
338  //check if segment intersects outer hull of box
339  if( !intersect || segmentBoxHullIntersection){
340  if( dim == 2){ //check if box edge and segment intersect
341 
342  for( int i=0; i<4; ++i){
343  edgeOfBox( i, A0, A1, B0, B1);
344 
345  if( intersectSegmentSegment(B0,B1,V0,V1,p,distanceTolerance)) {
346  intersect = true;
347  if(!segmentBoxHullIntersection) break;
348 
349  intrPtr->push_back(p);
350  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(1);
351  }
352  }
353 
354 
355  } else if( dim==3 ) { //3D check if box face and segment intersect
356 
357  std::array<array3D, 4> E;
358 
359  for( int i=0; i<6; ++i){
360  faceOfBox( i, A0, A1, E[0], E[1], E[2], E[3]);
361 
362  if( intersectSegmentPolygon(V0,V1,E.size(),E.data(),p,distanceTolerance) ) {
363  intersect = true;
364  if(!segmentBoxHullIntersection) break;
365 
366  intrPtr->push_back(p);
367  if(addFlag) flagPtr->push_back(1);
368  }
369  }
370  }
371  }
372 
373  return intersect;
374 
375 }
376 
390 bool _intersectPlaneBox(array3D const &P, array3D const &N, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, std::vector<array3D> *intrPtr, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
391 {
392 
393  bool intersect(false);
394  bool computeIntersection(intrPtr);
395 
396  if(computeIntersection){
397  intrPtr->clear();
398  } else if( intersectPointBox(P,A0,A1,dim,distanceTolerance)) {
399  return true;
400  }
401 
402  // check if plane intersects the edges of the box
403  // and store eventually intersection points
404  int edgeCount = (dim==2) ? 4 : 12;
405  array3D E0, E1, V;
406 
407  for(int i=0; i<edgeCount; ++i){
408  edgeOfBox(i, A0, A1, E0, E1);
409 
410  if( intersectSegmentPlane( E0, E1, P, N, V, distanceTolerance) ){
411  intersect = true;
412 
413  if(intrPtr){
414  intrPtr->push_back(V);
415  } else {
416  break;
417  }
418  }
419  }
420 
421 
422  // sort intersection points in couterclock-wise sense
423  if( dim==3 && intrPtr && intersect){
424 
425  const array3D origin = intrPtr->at(0);
426 
427  std::sort(intrPtr->begin(), intrPtr->end(), [&](const array3D &lhs, const array3D &rhs) -> bool {
428  array3D v = crossProduct(lhs-origin,rhs-origin);
429  return dotProduct(v, N) < 0;
430  } );
431  }
432 
433  return intersect;
434 }
435 
452 bool _intersectBoxPolygon(array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, std::size_t nVS, array3D const *VS, bool innerPolygonPoints, bool polygonEdgeBoxHullIntersection, bool polygonBoxEdgeIntersections, std::vector<array3D> *intrPtr, std::vector<int> *flagPtr, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
453 {
454 
455  bool intersect(false);
456  bool addFlag(flagPtr!=nullptr);
457  bool computeIntersection(innerPolygonPoints || polygonEdgeBoxHullIntersection || polygonBoxEdgeIntersections);
458 
459  assert( ! (computeIntersection && (intrPtr==nullptr) ) );
460 
461  if(computeIntersection){
462  intrPtr->clear();
463  }
464 
465  if(addFlag){
466  flagPtr->clear();
467  }
468 
469  array3D V0, V1, V2;
470 
471  //check if simplex boundig box and box overlap -> necessary condition
472  computeAABBPolygon( nVS, VS, V0, V1);
473  if( !intersectBoxBox( A0, A1, V0, V1, dim, distanceTolerance) ) {
474  return false;
475  }
476 
477  std::vector<array3D> partialIntr;
478  std::vector<int> partialFlag;
479 
480  // check if triangle vertices lie within box
481  // or if triangles intersect edges of box
482  computeIntersection = innerPolygonPoints || polygonBoxEdgeIntersections;
483  int trianglesCount = polygonSubtriangleCount(nVS, VS);
484  for (int triangle=0; triangle<trianglesCount; ++triangle) {
485  subtriangleOfPolygon(triangle, nVS, VS, V0, V1, V2);
486 
487  if( _intersectBoxTriangle( A0, A1, V0, V1, V2, innerPolygonPoints, false, polygonBoxEdgeIntersections, &partialIntr, &partialFlag, dim, distanceTolerance ) ){
488 
489  intersect = true;
490  if(!computeIntersection) break;
491 
492  int intrCount = partialIntr.size();
493  for( int i=0; i<intrCount; ++i){
494 
495  array3D &candidateCoord = partialIntr[i];
496  int candidateFlag = partialFlag[i];
497 
498  //prune duplicate points
499  auto PItr = intrPtr->begin();
500  bool iterate = (PItr!=intrPtr->end());
501  while(iterate){
502 
503  iterate = !utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2( *PItr -candidateCoord ), 0., distanceTolerance );
504 
505  if(iterate){
506  ++PItr;
507  }
508  iterate &= PItr!=intrPtr->end();
509  }
510 
511  if(PItr!=intrPtr->end()){
512  continue;
513  }
514 
515  intrPtr->push_back(candidateCoord);
516  if(addFlag){
517  flagPtr->push_back(candidateFlag);
518  }
519  }
520  }
521  }
522 
523  // check if edges of polygon intersect box face
524  computeIntersection = polygonEdgeBoxHullIntersection;
525  int edgesCount = polygonEdgesCount(nVS, VS);
526  if(!intersect || polygonEdgeBoxHullIntersection){
527  for (int edge=0; edge<edgesCount; ++edge) {
528  edgeOfPolygon(edge, nVS, VS, V0, V1);
529 
530  if( _intersectSegmentBox( V0, V1, A0, A1, false, polygonEdgeBoxHullIntersection, &partialIntr, &partialFlag, dim, distanceTolerance) ){
531 
532  intersect = true;
533  if(!computeIntersection) break;
534 
535  int intrCount = partialIntr.size();
536  for( int i=0; i<intrCount; ++i){
537 
538  array3D &candidateCoord = partialIntr[i];
539  int candidateFlag = partialFlag[i];
540 
541  //prune duplicate points
542  auto PItr = intrPtr->begin();
543  bool iterate = (PItr!=intrPtr->end());
544  while(iterate){
545 
546  iterate = !utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2( *PItr -candidateCoord ), 0., distanceTolerance );
547 
548  if(iterate){
549  ++PItr;
550  }
551  iterate &= PItr!=intrPtr->end();
552  }
553 
554  if(PItr!=intrPtr->end()){
555  continue;
556  }
557 
558  intrPtr->push_back(candidateCoord);
559  if(addFlag){
560  flagPtr->push_back(candidateFlag);
561  }
562  }
563  }
564  }
565  }
566 
567  return intersect;
568 }

576 bool validSegment(const array3D &P0, const array3D &P1 )
577 {
578  return !utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(P1-P0), 0.);
579 }

587 bool validLine(const array3D &P, const array3D &n )
588 {
589  BITPIT_UNUSED(P);
590  return utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(n), 1.);
591 }

599 bool validPlane(const array3D &P, const array3D &n )
600 {
601  BITPIT_UNUSED(P);
602  return utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(n), 1.);
603 }
604 
612 bool validTriangle(const array3D &P0, const array3D &P1, const array3D &P2 )
613 {
614 
615  array3D v0 = P1 -P0;
616  if( utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(v0), 0.) ){
617  return false;
618  }
619 
620  array3D v1 = P2 -P1;
621  if( utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(v1), 0.) ){
622  return false;
623  }
624 
625  array3D v2 = P0 -P2;
626  if( utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(v2), 0.) ){
627  return false;
628  }
629 
630  array3D n = crossProduct( v0, -1.*v2);
631  if( utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()( norm2(n), 0. ) ){
632  return false;
633  }
634 
635  return true;
636 }
637 
644 bool validBarycentric(double const *lambdaPtr, int n )
645 {
646 
647  double sum(-1.);
648  double maxValue(0.);
649 
650  for(int i=0; i<n; ++i){
651 
652  double value = lambdaPtr[i];
653  if( std::abs(value) > std::abs(maxValue) ){
654  sum -= maxValue;
655  maxValue = -value;
656 
657  } else {
658  sum += value;
659 
660  }
661 
662  }
663 
664  double tolerance = std::max(1., std::abs(maxValue)) * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
665  return utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(sum, maxValue, tolerance);
666 }
667 
676 int convertBarycentricToFlagSegment( std::array<double,2> const &lambda)
677 {
678 
679  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],2) );
680 
681  if (lambda[0]>=1.) {
682  return 1;
683 
684  } else if (lambda[1]>=1.) {
685  return 2;
686 
687  }
688 
689  return 0;
690 }
691 
700 int convertBarycentricToFlagTriangle( array3D const &lambda)
701 {
702 
703  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],3) );
704 
705  int count = 0;
706  std::array<int,2> zeros = {{0,0}};
707 
708  for( int i=0; i<3; ++i){
709  if ( lambda[i] <= 0.) {
710  zeros[count] = i;
711  ++count;
712  }
713  }
714 
715  if( count == 1){
716  int vertex0 = (zeros[0] +1) %3;
717  count = -(vertex0+1);
718 
719  } else if (count == 2) {
720  count = 3 -zeros[0] -zeros[1] +1;
721 
722  }
723 
724  return count;
725 }
726 
735 int convertBarycentricToFlagPolygon( std::vector<double> const &lambda)
736 {
737  return convertBarycentricToFlagPolygon( lambda.size(), lambda.data());
738 }
739 
749 int convertBarycentricToFlagPolygon( std::size_t nLambda, double const *lambda)
750 {
751 
752  int count(0);
753  std::size_t firstPositive(nLambda);
754 
755  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],nLambda) );
756 
757  for( std::size_t i=0; i<nLambda; ++i){
758  if ( lambda[i] > 0.) {
759  firstPositive = std::min( firstPositive, i);
760  ++count;
761  }
762  }
763 
764  if( count == 1){
765  count = firstPositive +1;
766 
767  } else if (count==2) {
768  count = -(firstPositive+1);
769 
770  } else {
771  count = 0;
772  }
773 
774  return count;
775 }

786 void computeGeneralizedBarycentric( array3D const &p, std::vector<array3D> const &vertex, std::vector<double> &lambda)
787 {
788  computeGeneralizedBarycentric( p, vertex.size(), vertex.data(), lambda);
789 }
790 
801 void computeGeneralizedBarycentric( array3D const &p, std::size_t nVertices, array3D const *vertex, std::vector<double> &lambda)
802 {
803  lambda.resize(nVertices);
804 
805  computeGeneralizedBarycentric( p, nVertices, vertex, lambda.data());
806 }
807 
818 void computeGeneralizedBarycentric( array3D const &p, std::size_t nVertices, array3D const *vertex, double *lambda)
819 {
820  const int MAX_ELEM_VERTICES = 8;
821  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(area, double, nVertices, MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
822 
823  for( std::size_t i=0; i<nVertices; ++i){
824  int next = (i +1) %nVertices;
825  area[i] = areaTriangle( vertex[i], vertex[next], p);
826  }
827 
828  double sumWeight(0);
829 
830  for( std::size_t i=0; i<nVertices; ++i){
831  std::size_t prev = (i +nVertices -1) %nVertices;
832  std::size_t next = (i +1) %nVertices;
833  lambda[i] = areaTriangle(vertex[prev], vertex[i], vertex[next]);
834 
835  for( std::size_t j=0; j<nVertices; ++j){
836  if( j==prev || j==i){
837  continue;
838  }
839 
840  lambda[i] *= area[j];
841  }
842 
843  sumWeight += lambda[i];
844  }
845 
846  for( std::size_t i=0; i<nVertices; ++i){
847  lambda[i] /= sumWeight;
848  }
849 }
850 
858 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricSegment(array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, std::array<double,2> const &lambda)
859 {
860  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],2) );
861 
862  return lambda[0]*Q0 +lambda[1]*Q1;
863 }
864 
872 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricSegment(array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, double const *lambda)
873 {
874  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],2) );
875 
876  return lambda[0]*Q0 +lambda[1]*Q1;
877 }
878 
887 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle(array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D const &lambda)
888 {
889  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],3) );
890 
891  return lambda[0]*Q0 +lambda[1]*Q1 +lambda[2]*Q2;
892 }
893 
902 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle(array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, double const *lambda)
903 {
904  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0],3) );
905 
906  return lambda[0]*Q0 +lambda[1]*Q1 +lambda[2]*Q2;
907 }
908 
915 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( std::vector<array3D> const &V, std::vector<double> const &lambda)
916 {
917  return reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( V.size(), V.data(), lambda);
918 }
919 
927 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, std::vector<double> const &lambda)
928 {
929  return reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon(nV, V, lambda.data());
930 }
931 
939 array3D reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, double const *lambda)
940 {
941  assert( validBarycentric(lambda, nV) );
942 
943  array3D xP = {{0.,0.,0.}};
944  for(std::size_t i=0; i<nV; ++i){
945  xP += lambda[i]*V[i];
946  }
947 
948  return xP;
949 }
950 
958 array3D projectPointLine( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q, array3D const &n )
959 {
960  assert( validLine(Q,n) );
961  return Q + dotProduct(P - Q, n) * n;
962 }
963 
971 array3D projectPointPlane( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q, array3D const &n )
972 {
973  assert( validPlane(Q,n) );
974  return P - dotProduct(P - Q, n) * n;
975 }
976 
984 array3D projectPointSegment( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1)
985 {
986 
987  std::array<double,2> lambda;
988  return projectPointSegment( P, Q0, Q1, &lambda[0] );
989 }
990 
999 array3D projectPointSegment( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, std::array<double,2> &lambda )
1000 {
1001  return projectPointSegment( P, Q0, Q1, &lambda[0]);
1002 }
1003 
1012 array3D projectPointSegment( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, double *lambda )
1013 {
1014 
1015  assert( validSegment(Q0,Q1) );
1016 
1017  array3D n = Q1 -Q0;
1018  double t = -dotProduct(n,Q0-P) / dotProduct(n,n);
1019 
1020  // Restrict projection onto the segment
1021  t = std::max( std::min( t, 1.), 0. );
1022 
1023  lambda[0] = 1. - t;
1024  lambda[1] = t;
1025 
1026  return reconstructPointFromBarycentricSegment( Q0, Q1, lambda);
1027 }
1028 
1037 array3D projectPointTriangle( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2)
1038 {
1039  array3D xP;
1040  array3D lambda;
1041  _projectPointsTriangle( 1, &P, Q0, Q1, Q2, &xP, lambda.data() );
1042  return xP;
1043 }
1044 
1054 array3D projectPointTriangle( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D &lambda)
1055 {
1056  return projectPointTriangle( P, Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda.data() );
1057 }

1068 array3D projectPointTriangle( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, double *lambda)

1071  _projectPointsTriangle( 1, &P, Q0, Q1, Q2, &xP, lambda );
1072 
1073  return xP;

1084 array3D restrictPointTriangle( array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D &lambda)
1085 {
1086  return restrictPointTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, &lambda[0] );
1087 }
1088 
1097 array3D restrictPointTriangle( array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, double *lambda)
1098 {
1099 
1100  assert( validBarycentric(&lambda[0], 3) );
1101 
1102  std::array<const array3D*,3> r = {{&Q0, &Q1, &Q2}};
1103 
1104  int count = 0;
1105  std::array<int,2> negatives = {{ 0, 0 }};
1106 
1107  for( int i=0; i<3; ++i){
1108  if( lambda[i] < 0){
1109  negatives[count] = i;
1110  ++count;
1111  }
1112  }
1113 
1114  if( count == 0){
1115  return reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda );
1116 
1117  } else if( count == 1){
1118  std::array<double,2> lambdaLocal;
1119  int vertex0 = (negatives[0] +1) %3;
1120  int vertex1 = (vertex0 +1) %3;
1121  array3D P = reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda );
1122  array3D xP = projectPointSegment(P, *r[vertex0], *r[vertex1], lambdaLocal);
1123  lambda[negatives[0]] = 0.;
1124  lambda[vertex0] = lambdaLocal[0];
1125  lambda[vertex1] = lambdaLocal[1];
1126  return xP;
1127 
1128  } else {
1129  int vertex0 = 3 -negatives[0] -negatives[1];
1130 
1131  int vertex1 = (vertex0 +1) %3;
1132  int vertex2 = (vertex1 +1) %3;
1133 
1134  array3D s01 = *r[vertex1] - *r[vertex0];
1135  array3D s02 = *r[vertex2] - *r[vertex0];
1136 
1137  if(dotProduct(s01,s02) >= 0 ){
1138  lambda[0] = 0.;
1139  lambda[1] = 0.;
1140  lambda[2] = 0.;
1141  lambda[vertex0] = 1.;
1142  return *r[vertex0];
1143 
1144  } else {
1145  std::array<double,2> lambdaLocal01, lambdaLocal02;
1146  array3D P = reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle( Q0, Q1, Q2, lambda );
1147 
1148  array3D xP01 = projectPointSegment(P, *r[vertex0], *r[vertex1], lambdaLocal01);
1149  array3D xP02 = projectPointSegment(P, *r[vertex0], *r[vertex2], lambdaLocal02);
1150 
1151  if( norm2(P-xP01) <= norm2(P-xP02) ){
1152  lambda[vertex0] = lambdaLocal01[0];
1153  lambda[vertex1] = lambdaLocal01[1];
1154  lambda[vertex2] = 0.;
1155  return xP01;
1156 
1157  } else {
1158  lambda[vertex0] = lambdaLocal02[0];
1159  lambda[vertex1] = 0;
1160  lambda[vertex2] = lambdaLocal02[1];
1161  return xP02;
1162  }
1163 
1164  }
1165 
1166  }
1167 
1168  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("CANNOT REACH");
1169 
1170 }
1171 
1182 std::vector<array3D> projectCloudTriangle( std::vector<array3D> const &cloud, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, std::vector<array3D> &lambda )
1183 {
1184 
1185  int cloudCount(cloud.size());
1186 
1187  std::vector<array3D> xP(cloudCount);
1188 
1189  lambda.resize(cloudCount);
1190 
1191  _projectPointsTriangle( cloudCount, cloud.data(), Q0, Q1, Q2, xP.data(), &lambda[0][0]);
1192 
1193  return xP;
1194 
1195 }

1241 array3D projectPointPolygon( array3D const &P, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, std::vector<double> &lambda)
1242 {

1244 
1245  return projectPointPolygon(P, nV, V, lambda.data());
1246 }
1247 
1256 array3D projectPointPolygon( array3D const &P, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, double *lambda)
1257 {
1258  array3D xP;
1259 
1260  double distance, minDistance(std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
1261  int minTriangle = -1;
1262  array3D V0, V1, V2;
1263  array3D localLambda, minLambda;
1264 
1265  // Compute the distance from each triangle in the simplex
1266  int triangleCount = polygonSubtriangleCount(nV, V);
1267 
1268  for (int triangle=0; triangle < triangleCount; ++triangle) {
1269 
1270  subtriangleOfPolygon( triangle, nV, V, V0, V1, V2);
1271 
1272  distance = distancePointTriangle(P, V0, V1, V2, localLambda);
1273 
1274  if (distance <= minDistance) {
1275 
1276  minDistance = distance;
1277 
1278  minLambda = localLambda;
1279  minTriangle = triangle;
1280  }
1281 
1282  } //next triangle
1283 
1284  assert(minTriangle >= 0);
1285  subtriangleOfPolygon( minTriangle, nV, V, V0, V1, V2);
1286  xP = reconstructPointFromBarycentricTriangle( V0, V1, V2, minLambda);
1287 
1288  computeGeneralizedBarycentric( xP, nV, V, lambda);
1289 
1290  return xP;
1291 
1292 }
1293 
1302 array3D projectPointCone( array3D const &point, array3D const &apex, array3D const &axis, double alpha)
1303 {
1304 
1305 
1306  if( alpha <= BITPIT_PI_2 ) { //accute cone angle
1307 
1308  array3D versor = point-apex;
1309  versor /= norm2(versor);
1310 
1311  double cosPointAxis = dotProduct(versor,axis);
1312  double cosCriticalAngle = cos(alpha+BITPIT_PI_2);
1313 
1314  if( cosPointAxis <= cosCriticalAngle ){ //point projects on cone apex
1315  return apex;
1316 
1317  } else { // point projects on cone surface
1318 
1319  array3D planeNormal = crossProduct(axis,versor);
1320  planeNormal /= norm2(planeNormal);
1321 
1322  array3D direction = rotateVector(axis,planeNormal,alpha);
1323 
1324  return projectPointLine(point,apex,direction);
1325 
1326  }
1327 
1328  } else { // abtuse cone angle -> project on complement
1329  return projectPointCone( point, apex, -1.*axis, BITPIT_PI-alpha);
1330 
1331  }
1332 
1333 }
1334 
1343 double distancePointLine( array3D const &P, array3D const &Q, array3D const &n, array3D &xP)
1344 {
1345  xP = projectPointLine(P,Q,n);
1346  return norm2( P-xP);
1347 }
1348

1359  xP = projectPointPlane(P,Q,n);
1360  return norm2(P-xP);
1361 }

1456 std::vector<double> distanceCloudTriangle( std::vector<array3D> const &cloud, array3D const &Q0, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, std::vector<array3D> &lambda )
1457 {
1458  int N(cloud.size());
1459 
1460  lambda.resize(N);
1461 
1462  std::vector<array3D> xP(N);
1463  _projectPointsTriangle( N, cloud.data(), Q0, Q1, Q2, xP.data(), &lambda[0][0]);
1464 
1465  std::vector<double> d(N);
1466  std::vector<double>::iterator distance = d.begin();
1467 
1468  std::vector<array3D>::iterator projection = xP.begin();
1469  for( const auto &point : cloud){
1470  *distance = norm2( point - *projection);
1471 
1472  ++projection;
1473  ++distance;
1474  }
1475 
1476  return d;
1477 }

1501 double distancePointPolygon( array3D const &P, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, array3D &xP, int &flag)
1502 {
1503  const int MAX_ELEM_VERTICES = 8;
1504  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(lambda, double, nV, MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
1505 
1506  double distance = distancePointPolygon( P, nV, V, lambda);
1507  xP = reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( nV, V, lambda );
1508  flag = convertBarycentricToFlagPolygon( nV, lambda );
1509 
1510  return distance;
1511 }

1600 std::vector<double> distanceCloudPolygon( std::vector<array3D> const &cloud, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, std::vector<array3D> &xP, std::vector<int> &flag)
1601 {
1602  int cloudCount( cloud.size() );
1603 
1604  std::vector<std::vector<double>> lambda( cloudCount, std::vector<double> (nV));
1605  std::vector<double> d = distanceCloudPolygon( cloud, nV, V, lambda);
1606 
1607  xP.resize(cloudCount);
1608  std::vector<array3D>::iterator xPItr = xP.begin();
1609 
1610  flag.resize(cloudCount);
1611  std::vector<int>::iterator flagItr = flag.begin();
1612 
1613  for( const auto &l : lambda){
1614  *flagItr = convertBarycentricToFlagPolygon( l );
1615  *xPItr = reconstructPointFromBarycentricPolygon( nV, V, l );
1616 
1617  ++xPItr;
1618  ++flagItr;
1619  }
1620 
1621  return d;
1622 }

1633 }
1634 
1642 std::vector<double> distanceCloudPolygon( std::vector<array3D> const &P, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V)
1643 {
1644  int cloudCount(P.size());
1645 
1646  std::vector<double> d(cloudCount,std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
1647 
1648  int triangleCount = polygonSubtriangleCount(nV, V);
1649  array3D V0, V1, V2;
1650 
1651  for (int triangle=0; triangle < triangleCount; ++triangle) { // foreach triangle
1652  subtriangleOfPolygon( triangle, nV, V, V0, V1, V2);
1653  std::vector<double> dT = distanceCloudTriangle(P, V0, V1, V2);
1654 
1655  d = min(d,dT);
1656  }
1657 
1658  return d;
1659 }

1671 }

1681 std::vector<double> distanceCloudPolygon( std::vector<array3D> const &cloud, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, std::vector<std::vector<double>> &lambda)
1682 {
1683  int cloudCount(cloud.size()), vertexCount(nV);
1684 
1685  std::vector<double> d(cloudCount,std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
1686  lambda.resize(cloudCount, std::vector<double>(vertexCount,0) );
1687 
1688  std::vector<double> dTemp(cloudCount);
1689  std::vector<array3D> lambdaTemp(cloudCount);
1690  int triangleCount = polygonSubtriangleCount(nV, V);
1691  array3D V0, V1, V2;
1692 
1693  for (int triangle=0; triangle < triangleCount; ++triangle) { // foreach triangle
1694  subtriangleOfPolygon( triangle, nV, V, V0, V1, V2);
1695  dTemp = distanceCloudTriangle(cloud, V0, V1, V2, lambdaTemp);
1696 
1697  for(int i=0; i< cloudCount; ++i){
1698  if( dTemp[i] < d[i]){
1699  d[i] = dTemp[i];
1700  std::copy( lambdaTemp[i].begin(), lambdaTemp[i].end(), lambda[i].begin());
1701  }
1702  }
1703  }
1704 
1705  return d;
1706 }
1707 
1716 double distanceLineLine( array3D const &P0, array3D const &n0, array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1)
1717 {
1718  array3D xP0, xP1;
1719  return distanceLineLine( P0, n0, P1, n1, xP0, xP1);
1720 }
1721 
1732 double distanceLineLine( array3D const &P0, array3D const &n0, array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1, array3D &xP0, array3D &xP1)
1733 {
1734  assert( validLine(P0,n0) );
1735  assert( validLine(P1,n1) );
1736 
1737  double n01 = dotProduct(n0,n1);
1738  double det = 1. - n01*n01;
1739 
1740  // check if lines are parallel
1741  if( std::abs(det) < 1.e-12){
1742  double distance = distancePointLine(P0, P1, n1, xP1);
1743  xP0 = projectPointLine(xP1, P0, n0);
1744  return distance;
1745  }
1746 
1747 
1748  array3D dP = P1-P0;
1749  double rhs0 = dotProduct(dP,n0);
1750  double rhs1 = -dotProduct(dP,n1);
1751 
1752  double det0 = rhs0 +rhs1*n01;
1753  double det1 = rhs1 +rhs0*n01;
1754 
1755  double s0 = det0/det;
1756  double s1 = det1/det;
1757 
1758  xP0 = P0 +s0*n0;
1759  xP1 = P1 +s1*n1;
1760 
1761  return norm2( xP0 - xP1);
1762 }
1763 
1774 bool intersectLineLine( array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1, array3D const &P2, array3D const &n2, array3D &P, double distanceTolerance)
1775 {
1776  array3D xP1, xP2;
1777  if( distanceLineLine(P1,n1,P2,n2,xP1,xP2) < distanceTolerance){
1778  P = xP1;
1779  return true;
1780  }
1781 
1782  return false;
1783 }
1784 
1795 bool intersectSegmentSegment( array3D const &P1, array3D const &P2, array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D &x, double distanceTolerance)
1796 {
1797  assert( validSegment(P1,P2) );
1798  assert( validSegment(Q1,Q2) );
1799 
1800  array3D nP = P2 - P1;
1801  nP /= norm2(nP);
1802 
1803  array3D nQ = Q2 - Q1;
1804  nQ /= norm2(nQ);
1805 
1806  array3D temp;
1807  if( intersectLineLine(P1, nP, Q1, nQ, temp, distanceTolerance) && intersectPointSegment( temp, P1, P2, distanceTolerance) && intersectPointSegment(temp, Q1, Q2, distanceTolerance) ){
1808  x = temp;
1809  return true;
1810  }
1811 
1812  return false;
1813 }
1814 
1826 bool intersectLinePlane( array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1, array3D const &P2, array3D const &n2, array3D &P, const double coplanarityTolerance)
1827 {
1828 
1829  assert( validLine(P1,n1) );
1830  assert( validPlane(P2,n2) );
1831 
1832  // ========================================================================== //
1833  // CHECK DEGENERATE CASES //
1834  // ========================================================================== //
1835  double s = dotProduct(n1, n2);
1836  if (std::abs(s) < std::cos(0.5*BITPIT_PI-coplanarityTolerance)) {
1837  return false;
1838  }
1839 
1840  // ========================================================================== //
1841  // FIND INTERSECTION POINTS //
1842  // ========================================================================== //
1843  double xi = -dotProduct(P1 - P2, n2) /s;
1844  P = P1 + xi *n1;
1845 
1846  return true;
1847 }
1848 
1859 bool intersectSegmentPlane( array3D const &Q1, array3D const &Q2, array3D const &P2, array3D const &n2, array3D &P, const double distanceTolerance)
1860 {
1861 
1862  assert( validSegment(Q1,Q2) );
1863  assert( validPlane(P2,n2) );
1864 
1865  array3D n = Q2 - Q1;
1866  n /= norm2(n);
1867 
1868  array3D xP;
1869  if ( intersectLinePlane(Q1, n, P2, n2, xP, distanceTolerance) && intersectPointSegment(xP, Q1, Q2, distanceTolerance) ) {
1870  P = xP;
1871  return true;
1872  }
1873 
1874  return false;
1875 }
1876 
1889 bool intersectPlanePlane( array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1, array3D const &P2, array3D const &n2,
1890  array3D &Pl, array3D &nl, const double coplanarityTolerance)
1891 {
1892 
1893  assert( validPlane(P1,n1) );
1894  assert( validPlane(P2,n2) );
1895 
1896  double n12 = dotProduct(n1, n2);
1897  // check degenerate condition
1898  if( std::abs(n12) > std::cos(coplanarityTolerance)) {
1899  return false;
1900  }
1901 
1902 
1903  double detCB = 1.0-n12*n12;
1904 
1905 
1906  nl = crossProduct(n1,n2);
1907  nl /= norm2(nl);
1908 
1909  // if planes intersect, determine the closest point
1910  // to P1 and P2 as anchor point. The augmented functional
1911  // I = 0.5*[ (Pl-P1)^2 + (Pl-P2)^2] + lambda1[ n1.(Pl-P1) ] +lambda2[ n2.(Pl-P2) ]
1912  // where lambda1 and lambda2 are Lagrange multipliers.
1913  // The optimality conditions I,Pl I,lambda1 I,lambda2 are
1914  // solved using the Schur complment
1915 
1916  array3D dP = P2-P1;
1917  std::array<double,2> rhs = {{ dotProduct(n1,dP) , -dotProduct(n2,dP) }};
1918 
1919  double det1 = rhs[0] - n12*rhs[1];
1920  double det2 = rhs[1] - n12*rhs[0];
1921  double lambda1 = det1 /detCB;
1922  double lambda2 = det2 /detCB;
1923 
1924  Pl = P1 +P2 -lambda1*n1 -lambda2*n2;
1925  Pl *= 0.5;
1926 
1927  return true;
1928 
1929 }
1930 
1941 bool intersectPlaneBox( array3D const &P1, array3D const &n1, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
1942 {
1943  assert( validPlane(P1,n1) );
1944  return _intersectPlaneBox( P1, n1, A0, A1, nullptr, dim, distanceTolerance);
1945 }

1975 bool intersectLineTriangle( array3D const &P, array3D const &n, array3D const &A, array3D const &B, array3D const &C, array3D &Q, const double distanceTolerance)
1976 {
1977  assert( validLine(P,n) );
1978  assert( validTriangle(A,B,C) );
1979 
1980  array3D nT = crossProduct(B - A, C - A);
1981  nT /= norm2(nT);
1982 
1983  array3D xP;
1984  if ( intersectLinePlane(P, n, A, nT, xP, distanceTolerance) && intersectPointTriangle(xP, A, B, C, distanceTolerance) ) {
1985  Q = xP;
1986  return true;
1987  }
1988 
1989  return false;
1990 }
1991 
2003 bool intersectSegmentTriangle( array3D const &P0, array3D const &P1, array3D const &A, array3D const &B, array3D const &C, array3D &Q, const double distanceTolerance)
2004 {
2005  assert( validSegment(P0,P1) );
2006  assert( validTriangle(A,B,C) );
2007 
2008  array3D n = P1 - P0;
2009  n /= norm2(n);
2010 
2011  array3D xP;
2012  if ( intersectLineTriangle(P0, n, A, B, C, xP, distanceTolerance) && intersectPointSegment(xP, P0, P1, distanceTolerance) ) {
2013  Q = xP;
2014  return true;
2015  }
2016 
2017  return false;
2018 }

2044 bool intersectLinePolygon( array3D const &P, array3D const &n, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, array3D &Q, const double distanceTolerance)
2045 {
2046  assert( validLine(P,n) );
2047 
2048  int nTriangles = polygonSubtriangleCount(nV, V);
2049  array3D V0, V1, V2;
2050 
2051  for( int i=0; i< nTriangles; ++i){
2052  subtriangleOfPolygon(i, nV, V, V0, V1, V2);
2053 
2054  if( intersectLineTriangle(P, n, V0, V1, V2, Q, distanceTolerance) ) {
2055  return true;
2056  }
2057  }
2058 
2059  return false;
2060 }

2114 bool intersectBoxBox(array3D const &A1, array3D const &A2, array3D const &B1, array3D const &B2, int dim, const double distanceTolerance)
2115 {
2116  for( int d=0; d<dim; ++d){
2117  if( B1[d] > A2[d] + distanceTolerance || B2[d] < A1[d] - distanceTolerance ){
2118  return false;
2119  }
2120  }
2121 
2122  return true;
2123 }

2137 bool intersectBoxBox(array3D const &A1, array3D const &A2, array3D const &B1, array3D const &B2, array3D &I1, array3D &I2, int dim, const double distanceTolerance )
2138 {
2139  for( int d=0; d<dim; ++d){
2140 
2141  if( B1[d] > A2[d] + distanceTolerance || B2[d] < A1[d] - distanceTolerance ){
2142  return false;
2143  }
2144 
2145  else{
2146  I1[d] = std::max( A1[d], B1[d] );
2147  I2[d] = std::min( A2[d], B2[d] );
2148  }
2149 
2150  }
2151 
2152  return true;
2153 }

2506 void computeAABBSegment(array3D const &A, array3D const &B, array3D &P0, array3D &P1)
2507 {
2508 
2509  P0 = A;
2510  P1 = A;
2511 
2512  for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
2513  P0[i] = std::min( P0[i], B[i] );
2514  P1[i] = std::max( P1[i], B[i] );
2515  }
2516 
2517  return;
2518 }

2528 void computeAABBTriangle(array3D const &A, array3D const &B, array3D const &C, array3D &P0, array3D &P1)
2529 {
2530  P0 = A;
2531  P1 = A;
2532 
2533  for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
2534  P0[i] = std::min( P0[i], B[i] );
2535  P0[i] = std::min( P0[i], C[i] );
2536 
2537  P1[i] = std::max( P1[i], B[i] );
2538  P1[i] = std::max( P1[i], C[i] );
2539  }
2540 
2541  return;
2542 }

2562 void computeAABBPolygon(std::size_t nVS, array3D const *VS, array3D &P0, array3D &P1)
2563 {
2564  P0 = VS[0];
2565  P1 = VS[0];
2566 
2567  for( std::size_t j=1; j<nVS; ++j){
2568  for( int i=0; i<3; ++i){
2569  P0[i] = std::min( P0[i], VS[j][i] );
2570  P1[i] = std::max( P1[i], VS[j][i] );
2571  }
2572  }
2573 
2574  return;
2575 }

2603 void unionAABB(std::vector<array3D> const &A0, std::vector<array3D> const &A1, array3D &C0, array3D &C1)
2604 {
2605 
2606  int n( std::min(A0.size(), A1.size() ) );
2607 
2608  if( n > 0 ){
2609  C0 = A0[0];
2610  C1 = A1[0];
2611 
2612  for( int i=1; i<n; ++i){
2613  unionAABB( A0[i], A1[i], C0, C1, C0, C1);
2614  }
2615  }
2616 
2617  return;

2644 void subtractionAABB(array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, array3D const &B0, array3D const &B1, array3D &C0, array3D &C1)
2645 {
2646  // X direction
2647  if( B0[1]<=A0[1] && B0[2]<=A0[2] && B1[1]>=A1[1] && B1[2]>=A1[2] ){
2648  C0[0] = ( B0[0]<=A0[0] && B1[0]>=A0[0] ) ? B1[0] : A0[0];
2649  C1[0] = ( B0[0]<=A1[0] && B1[0]>=A1[0] ) ? B0[0] : A1[0];
2650  }
2651 
2652  // Y direction
2653  if( B0[0]<=A0[0] && B0[2]<=A0[2] && B1[0]>=A1[0] && B1[2]>=A1[2] ){
2654  C0[1] = ( B0[1]<=A0[1] && B1[1]>=A0[1] ) ? B1[1] : A0[2];
2655  C1[1] = ( B0[1]<=A1[1] && B1[1]>=A1[1] ) ? B0[1] : A1[2];
2656  }
2657 
2658  // Z direction
2659  if( B0[0]<=A0[0] && B0[1]<=A0[1] && B1[0]>=A1[0] && B1[1]>=A1[1] ){
2660  C0[2] = ( B0[2]<=A0[2] && B1[2]>=A0[2] ) ? B1[2] : A0[2];
2661  C1[2] = ( B0[2]<=A1[2] && B1[2]>=A1[2] ) ? B0[2] : A1[2];
2662  }
2663 
2664  return;
2665 }
2666 
2674 void vertexOfSegment(int i, array3D const &V0, array3D const &V1, array3D &P)
2675 {
2676  switch(i){
2677 
2678  case 0:
2679  P = V0;
2680  break;
2681 
2682  case 1:
2683  P = V1;
2684  break;
2685 
2686  default:
2687  assert(false);
2688  break;
2689  }
2690 
2691  return;
2692 }
2693 
2702 void vertexOfTriangle(int i, array3D const &V0, array3D const &V1, array3D const &V2, array3D &P)
2703 {
2704  switch(i){
2705 
2706  case 0:
2707  P = V0;
2708  break;
2709 
2710  case 1:
2711  P = V1;
2712  break;
2713 
2714  case 2:
2715  P = V2;
2716  break;
2717 
2718  default:
2719  assert(false);
2720  break;
2721  }
2722 
2723  return;
2724 }

2735 void edgeOfTriangle(int i, array3D const &V0, array3D const &V1, array3D const &V2, array3D &P0, array3D &P1)
2736 {
2737  switch(i){
2738 
2739  case 0:
2740  P0 = V0;
2741  P1 = V1;
2742  break;
2743 
2744  case 1:
2745  P0 = V1;
2746  P1 = V2;
2747  break;
2748 
2749  case 2:
2750  P0 = V2;
2751  P1 = V0;
2752  break;
2753 
2754  default:
2755  assert(false);
2756  break;
2757  }
2758 
2759  return;
2760 }

2772 void faceOfBox(int i, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, array3D &P0, array3D &P1, array3D &P2, array3D &P3)
2773 {
2774 
2775  assert(i<6);
2776 
2777  int v0 = boxFaceVertexConnectivity[i][0];
2778  int v1 = boxFaceVertexConnectivity[i][1];
2779  int v2 = boxFaceVertexConnectivity[i][2];
2780  int v3 = boxFaceVertexConnectivity[i][3];
2781 
2782  vertexOfBox(v0, A0, A1, P0 );
2783  vertexOfBox(v1, A0, A1, P1 );
2784  vertexOfBox(v2, A0, A1, P2 );
2785  vertexOfBox(v3, A0, A1, P3 );
2786 
2787  return;
2788 }
2789 
2798 void edgeOfBox(int i, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, array3D &P0, array3D &P1)
2799 {
2800  assert(i<12);
2801 
2802  int v0 = boxEdgeVertexConnectivity[i][0];
2803  int v1 = boxEdgeVertexConnectivity[i][1];
2804 
2805  vertexOfBox(v0, A0, A1, P0 );
2806  vertexOfBox(v1, A0, A1, P1 );
2807 
2808  return;
2809 }
2810 
2818 void vertexOfBox(int i, array3D const &A0, array3D const &A1, array3D &P)
2819 {
2820 
2821  switch(i){
2822 
2823  case 0:
2824  P[0] = A0[0];
2825  P[1] = A0[1];
2826  P[2] = A0[2];
2827  break;
2828 
2829  case 1:
2830  P[0] = A1[0];
2831  P[1] = A0[1];
2832  P[2] = A0[2];
2833  break;
2834 
2835  case 2:
2836  P[0] = A0[0];
2837  P[1] = A1[1];
2838  P[2] = A0[2];
2839  break;
2840 
2841  case 3:
2842  P[0] = A1[0];
2843  P[1] = A1[1];
2844  P[2] = A0[2];
2845  break;
2846 
2847  case 4:
2848  P[0] = A0[0];
2849  P[1] = A0[1];
2850  P[2] = A1[2];
2851  break;
2852 
2853  case 5:
2854  P[0] = A1[0];
2855  P[1] = A0[1];
2856  P[2] = A1[2];
2857  break;
2858 
2859  case 6:
2860  P[0] = A0[0];
2861  P[1] = A1[1];
2862  P[2] = A1[2];
2863  break;
2864 
2865  case 7:
2866  P[0] = A1[0];
2867  P[1] = A1[1];
2868  P[2] = A1[2];
2869  break;
2870 
2871  default:
2872  assert(false);
2873  break;
2874 
2875  }
2876 
2877  return;
2878 }
2879 
2887 array3D rotateVector( array3D const &vector, array3D const &axis, double theta)
2888 {
2889 
2890  array3D rotated;
2891  double cosTheta = cos(theta);
2892 
2893  rotated = cosTheta * vector;
2894  rotated += sin(theta) * crossProduct(axis,vector);
2895  rotated += (1.0 - cosTheta) * dotProduct(axis,vector) * axis;
2896 
2897  return rotated;
2898 }
2899 
2906 double areaTriangle( array3D const &a, array3D const &b, array3D const &c)
2907 {
2908  return 0.5 *norm2(crossProduct(b-a,c-a));
2909 }

2912  * Gets the number of edges of a polygon
2913  * \return number of edges
2914  */

2916 {
2917  return polygonEdgesCount( V.size(), V.data());
2918 }

2923  * \param[in] V polygon vertices coordinates
2924  * \return number of edges
2925  */
2926 int polygonEdgesCount( std::size_t nV, array3D const *V)
2927 {
2928  BITPIT_UNUSED(V);
2929 
2930  return nV;
2931 }

2935  * \return number of subtriangles
2936  */
2937 int polygonSubtriangleCount( std::vector<array3D> const &V)
2938 {
2939  return polygonSubtriangleCount( V.size(), V.data());
2940 }
2941 
2942 /*
2943  * Gets the number of subtriangles of a polygon
2944  * \param[in] nV number of polygon vertices
2945  * \param[in] V polygon vertices coordinates
2946  * \return number of subtriangles
2947  */
2948 int polygonSubtriangleCount( std::size_t nV, array3D const *V)
2949 {
2950  BITPIT_UNUSED(V);
2951 
2952  return (nV - 2);
2953 }
2954 
2955 /*
2956  * Gets the edge coordinates of a convex polygon
2957  * \param[in] edge index
2958  * \param[in] V polgon vertices
2959  * \param[in] V0 first vertice coordinates of edge
2960  * \param[in] V1 second vertice coordinates of edge
2961  */
2962 void edgeOfPolygon( int edge, std::vector<array3D> const &V, array3D &V0, array3D &V1)
2963 {
2964  edgeOfPolygon( edge, V.size(), V.data(), V0, V1);
2965 }
2966 
2967 /*
2968  * Gets the edge coordinates of a convex polygon
2969  * \param[in] edge index
2970  * \param[in] nV number of polygon vertices
2971  * \param[in] V polgon vertices
2972  * \param[in] V0 first vertice coordinates of edge
2973  * \param[in] V1 second vertice coordinates of edge
2974  */
2975 void edgeOfPolygon( int edge, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, array3D &V0, array3D &V1)
2976 {
2977  assert(edge<polygonEdgesCount(nV, V));
2978 
2979  V0 = V[edge];
2980  V1 = V[(edge+1) % nV];
2981  return;
2982 }
2983 
2984 /*
2985  * Gets the subtriangle vertices' coordinates of a convex polygon
2986  * \param[in] triangle index of triangle
2987  * \param[in] V polgon vertices
2988  * \param[in] V0 first vertice coordinates of triangle
2989  * \param[in] V1 second vertice coordinates of triangle
2990  * \param[in] V2 third vertice coordinates of triangle
2991  */
2992 void subtriangleOfPolygon( int triangle, std::vector<array3D> const &V, array3D &V0, array3D &V1, array3D &V2)
2993 {
2994  subtriangleOfPolygon( triangle, V.size(), V.data(), V0, V1, V2);
2995 }
2996 
2997 /*
2998  * Gets the subtriangle vertices' coordinates of a convex polygon
2999  * \param[in] triangle index of triangle
3000  * \param[in] nV number of polygon vertices
3001  * \param[in] V polgon vertices
3002  * \param[in] V0 first vertice coordinates of triangle
3003  * \param[in] V1 second vertice coordinates of triangle
3004  * \param[in] V2 third vertice coordinates of triangle
3005  */
3006 void subtriangleOfPolygon( int triangle, std::size_t nV, array3D const *V, array3D &V0, array3D &V1, array3D &V2)
3007 {
3008  BITPIT_UNUSED(nV);
3009  assert(triangle<polygonSubtriangleCount(nV, V));
3010 
3011  V0 = V[0];
3012  V1 = V[triangle+1];
3013  V2 = V[triangle+2];
3014  return;
3015 }
3016 
3021 }
3022 
3023 }
